title: Bluey: Camping
description: Based on the wildly successful animated series Bluey, as seen on Disney+ Bluey makes a new friend while camping with her family!Bluey goes camping with her family and makes a new friend named Jean-Luc! Despite the language barrier, they have fun planting fruit trees, hunting a wild pig, and more! But when vacation ends, Bluey wonders if she'll ever get to see her new friend again.
author: Bluey
